summary:
Highly Detailed Dagger for very Sneaky Stabs, it's also Shiny

UPDATE 2.2 - Now Updated to Blend into Reflective and ambient lit ENB environments for best visual Quality.
descriptionHtml:
My Second Release and an Update to my First Attempt of my Slitter Dagger, It took a While but it's Finally Here. Remade the Whole thing, everything from meshes to textures. Hope you Guys Enjoy it!

Link to the Old One - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39828      ..Just Sayin


Location.. The Drunken Huntsman, The Wood Elf would Sell it to You, The One Behind the Counter.. This Dagger is O-Zone Friendly..
Also, Tempering Needs Advanced and Ebony Smithing, 2 Silver Ingots & 1 Ebony Ingot

PLEASE ENDORSE!! EVEN IF YOU JUST LIKE IT A LITTLE..

And Comment..

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
PS - Fixed Tempering and boosted critical hit mult. and damage slightly (still balanced) with Last Release!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Behringer911
